# Load Asset
<!--
@name: Load Asset
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Load an external file for Image, Audio, video or JSON. If the file is an image, it can be used with the "Bob" command.
## Parameters

- **path&dollar;**: Name of the file to load.
- **index**: Index associated at
---
